A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
#notmyluke 
This movie could be excellent if it was dealing with new characters in a new canon.  Unfortunately it is not.  

This arc has made the original trilogy's characters and storyline meaningless.  Our old heroes failed\, the scene at the end of RotJ does not signify victory and hope anymore.  None more impacted than the eternal optimist Luke Skywalker.  If you were going to betray the moral foundation of this character then don't bring him back!

Fans are not upset because TLJ's new concepts and changes.  They seem mostly upset because of the damage done to the OT story and characters.
